long_description: The REI Fleece On-Air Inflatable Pillow features a unique air valve that allows custom comfort with the touch of a button; just touch the valve button to find your ideal softness and support. Inflates with just 2 breaths and deflates instantly. Patented anti-stress design cradles head and neck in soft support. Removable fleece cover is machine washable. REI Fleece On-Air Inflatable Pillow comes with a mesh storage pouch.
short_description: The REI Fleece On-Air Inflatable Pillow features a unique air valve that allows custom comfort with the touch of a button; just touch the valve button to find your ideal softness and support.
